'''Cuihua Wood''' is obtained by cutting down Cuihua Trees. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==How to Obtain==
Cuihua Trees are found all over [[Teyvat]] and are recognizable by the various fruits they can bear: [[Apple]]s, [[Sunsettia]]s, [[Lavender Melon]]s, and [[Bulle Fruit]]. They are more commonly found in some areas, such as [[Starfell Valley]] and [[Bishui Plain]].

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=179 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
